      • Method Detail

        • static void extractGem(Project project, java.io.File jRubyClasspath, java.io.File gem, java.io.File destDir, OverwriteAction overwrite)

          Extracts a gem to a folder

          Parameters:
          project - Project instance
          jRubyClasspath - Where to find the jruby-complete jar
          gem - Gem file to extract
          destDir - Directory to extract to
          overwrite - Allow overwrite of an existing gem folder

        • static void extractGems(Project project, java.io.File jRubyClasspath, FileCollection gems, java.io.File destDir, OverwriteAction overwrite)

        • static void extractGems(Project project, Configuration jRubyConfig, Configuration gemConfig, java.io.File destDir, OverwriteAction action)

          Extract Gems from a given configuration.

          Parameters:
          project - Project instance
          jRubyClasspath - Where to find the jruby-complete jar
          gemConfig - Configuration containing GEMs
          destDir - Directory to extract to
          action - Allow overwrite of an existing gem folder

        • static CopySpec gemCopySpec(java.lang.Object properties = [:], Project project, java.lang.Object dir)

          Adds a GEM CopySpec to an archive The following are supported as properties:

          • fullGem (boolean) - Copy all of the GEM content, not just a minimal subset
          • subfolder (Object) - Adds an additional subfolder into the GEM
          Returns:
          Returns a CopySpec which can be attached as a child to another object that implements a CopySpec
          Parameters:
          Additional - properties to control behaviour
          dir - The source of the GEM files
          Since:
          0.1.2

        • static java.lang.String gemFullNameFromFile(java.lang.String filename)

          Take the given .gem filename (e.g. rake-10.3.2.gem) and just return the gem "full name" (e.g. rake-10.3.2)

        • static FileCollection getGems(FileCollection fc)

          Given a FileCollection return a filtered FileCollection only containing GEMs

          Returns:
          Filtered FileCollection
          Parameters:
          fc - Original FileCollection
